citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10 am on
13-Jun-18.
Rang doorbell. Left message on cell phone. Called back-not in town.
